original_text:
Then Balaam saw Amalek and spoke his message:
“Amalek was first among the nations,
    but their end will be utter destruction.”
korean_text: 또 아말렉을 바라보며 예언하여 이르기를 아말렉은 민족들의 으뜸이나 그의 종말은 멸망에 이르리로다 하고

sentences.original_text: Amalek was first among the nations,
but their end will be utter destruction.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 끝은 완전한 파멸이 될 것이다.
